ProjectTitle: Cross-coupling of diversified C(sp3) fragments with (hetero)aryl halides by upgrading Pd catalysis with the organocatalytic activation of amino acids
InitialFeedbackHistory:
29/02/2024
At the beginning of your DMP you state that there might be IP potential related to your data. You can therefore indicate "intellectual property rights" as a reason for restricted sharing of your research data.
Storing data on an laptop and external hard drives is usually not considered a good way to archive data. External hard drives have a high risk of loss, theft, or damage to the device, which can lead to data loss. Other storage solutions like the shared network drive are better options for archiving your data. You can check out the storage guide for more guidance: https://icts.kuleuven.be/storagewijzer/en
label: good with suggestions
